tutorials.title: Welcome to Rogue Signal Protocol
tutorials.content: You are a hacker's consciousness trapped in cyberspace. Navigate this network using stealth and cunning to reach the gateway without being detected by security processes.

tutorials.title: Movement
tutorials.content: Use WASD keys or arrow keys to move through the network grid. Each move takes one turn, and all enemies will move after you do.

tutorials.title: Shadows and Stealth
tutorials.content: Dark areas (◉) are shadow zones that provide complete concealment. Hide in shadows to avoid enemy detection. Walls (█) block vision for both you and enemies.

tutorials.title: Enemy Vision
tutorials.content: Orange circles around enemies show their vision range. Stay out of these areas to remain undetected. Different enemy types have different vision ranges.

tutorials.title: Detection System
tutorials.content: Your detection level rises when enemies see you or when you eliminate them. If detection reaches the threshold, the Admin Avatar will spawn to hunt you down.

tutorials.title: Begin Infiltration
tutorials.content: Navigate to the yellow gateway (>) to progress. Use stealth, observe enemy patterns, and stay in the shadows. Good luck, hacker.
